title: F1 Boom Lures Amazon, Dell and Oracle Into Tech-Sponsor Race - Sportico

description: When the Crypto.com Miami Grand Prix revs up this Saturday and Sunday, tech companies will compete for the podium every bit as much as frenemies Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen. Formula One has lâ€¦
